course_title: Fresh Sem: Religion: Hindu Gods and Goddesses
class_notes:
(Same as MESAS 190 1)
This course examines how Hindu gods and goddesses are described, experienced, and critiqued in South Asia. After an introduction to key terms and critical concepts integral to the Hindu traditions, we focus on three major deities: Vishnu, Shiva, and Devi. We will cover a range of sources, including pre-modern literary texts in Sanskrit and vernacular Indian languages, ritual images, popular comic books, and ethnographic accounts.
course_description: Dynamics of inquiry on a focused research topic. Will include discussion, debate, oral and written presentations. Topic varies.
